mapper.select: SELECT DAY(schedule_date) scheduleDay, COUNT(*) cnt, GROUP_CONCAT(substr(schedule_memo, 1, 5)) memo, GROUP_CONCAT(schedule_emoji) scheduleEmoji FROM schedule WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND YEAR(schedule_date) = #{Year} AND MONTH(schedule_date) = #{Month} GROUP BY schedule_date ORDER BY schedule_date ASC

SELECT schedule_date scheduleDate, schedule_memo scheduleMemo, member_id memberId, schedule_no scheduleNo FROM schedule WHERE YEAR(schedule_date) = #{Year} AND MONTH(schedule_date) = #{Month} AND DAY(schedule_date) = #{Day} AND member_id = #{memberId}
